name: Reshaper (itch)
description:
Reshaper About

Reshaper is a short puzzle game originally made for Ludum Dare 35. You control shapes that can move and shapeshift. The goal is to get the shapes into the correct positions.

Features
  • Simple puzzles
  • Easy controls and plain design
  • Built-in level editor
How to play

Use WASD to control the shapes. Press or use the mouse-wheel to switch your controls to a different shape.
